attributes.action: Deny Jeremy Hunt access to taxpayer money to fight the junior doctors.
attributes.background: Jeremy Hunt and the Conservative government will fight the junior doctors in court, and use taxpayers money to do so. Sign the petition banning the government from using taxpayers money to fight this.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to settle the case out of court, or to not fight the case in court.
